description: Prompt templates for 3:4 aspect ratio D&D character portraits

templates.name: Elven Wizard
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a wise {theme} skinned elf wizard, three-quarter view, intelligent piercing eyes with arcane knowledge depth, high cheekbones, pointed ears adorned with silver rings, long flowing silver hair, trimmed beard with mystical runes woven in, wearing deep purple robes with golden constellation embroidery, glowing arcane symbols floating around fingertips, holding ornate wooden staff with crystal tip, ancient library background with floating spell books and magical glyphs, warm candlelight from the side creating dramatic shadows, rim lighting on hair, fantasy character art, highly detailed facial features, D&D official art style, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Human Fighter
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a battle-hardened {theme} skinned human fighter, front-facing eye-level view, stern determined expression, weathered face with prominent scar across left eyebrow, short cropped dark hair, stubbled jaw, intense gaze showing years of combat experience, wearing polished steel plate armor with dented shoulder pauldron, leather straps and buckles visible, longsword hilt over shoulder, castle armory background with weapon racks softly blurred, dramatic side lighting highlighting armor reflections, strong rim light separating subject from background, fantasy warrior portrait, highly detailed facial scars and texture, D&D character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Dwarven Cleric
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a devout {theme} skinned dwarf cleric, bust shot, kind compassionate eyes with divine wisdom, broad weathered face, thick braided auburn beard with holy symbols woven in copper wire, aged laugh lines around eyes, wearing heavy chainmail under white and gold vestments, ornate holy symbol of Moradin hanging on thick chain, holding glowing blessed warhammer, temple interior background with stained glass windows casting colorful light, divine golden glow emanating softly from behind, warm atmospheric lighting, fantasy cleric portrait, highly detailed beard braiding and religious iconography, D&D official art style, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Half-Elf Rogue
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a cunning {theme} skinned half-elf rogue, three-quarter view with slight smirk, mischievous green eyes with calculating gleam, slightly pointed ears barely visible through shoulder-length dark hair, sharp angular features mixing human and elven heritage, thin scar on chin, wearing dark leather armor with multiple concealed blade sheaths, hood partially pulled back, lockpick tools visible on belt, shadowy tavern background with dim lantern light, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting emphasizing mysterious nature, slight rim light on face edges, fantasy rogue character art, highly detailed facial expression and leather texture, D&D character portrait, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Dragonborn Paladin
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a noble {theme} scaled dragonborn paladin, front-facing heroic pose, reptilian features with honorable expression, deep amber eyes radiating righteous conviction, brass-colored scales catching light, prominent jaw with small horns, wearing ornate full plate armor with holy engravings, golden trim on pauldrons, white cape with sacred order symbol, holding radiant blessed greatsword, grand cathedral background with divine light streaming through tall windows, holy golden aura surrounding figure, dramatic lighting from above, fantasy paladin portrait, highly detailed scale texture and armor engravings, D&D official character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Tiefling Warlock
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a charismatic {theme} skinned tiefling warlock, bust shot with confident smirk, striking violet eyes with slit pupils showing otherworldly pact, elegant curved horns sweeping back from forehead, sharp aristocratic features, long dark hair with single white streak, wearing dark purple velvet coat with silver occult symbols embroidered, ornate pendant with pulsing eldritch energy, fingertips crackling with violet magical power, mysterious study background with forbidden tomes and arcane artifacts, moody purple and blue lighting, dramatic shadows emphasizing infernal heritage, fantasy warlock portrait, highly detailed horn texture and magical effects, D&D character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Friendly Merchant
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a jovial {theme} skinned human merchant, waist-up view, warm welcoming smile with laugh lines, round friendly face, graying temples, neatly trimmed mustache, bright intelligent eyes showing shrewd business sense, wearing fine colorful silk vest with gold buttons over white shirt, ornate jewelry indicating prosperity, holding exotic trinket, bustling marketplace stall background with rare goods visible, warm afternoon sunlight, cheerful atmospheric lighting, fantasy NPC portrait, highly detailed facial expressions and fabric textures, D&D character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Tavern Keeper
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a weathered {theme} skinned dwarf tavern keeper, bust shot, knowing grin with missing tooth, kind eyes having seen countless adventures, wild gray beard, bald head, strong muscular arms, wearing stained leather apron over simple tunic, wiping hands on cloth, polished wooden bar and ale kegs in background, warm cozy tavern atmosphere with firelight glow, soft golden lighting, fantasy innkeeper portrait, highly detailed facial character and worn clothing, D&D NPC art style, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Noble Lord
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of an aristocratic {theme} skinned human noble, three-quarter view, proud dignified expression, sharp calculating eyes, perfectly groomed dark hair with gray at temples, clean-shaven angular features, wearing rich burgundy velvet doublet with gold threading, fur-trimmed cape, ornate signet ring, holding glass of wine, opulent throne room background with tapestries and heraldic banners, regal lighting with golden highlights, fantasy nobility portrait, highly detailed fabric textures and aristocratic bearing, D&D NPC character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Village Elder
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a wise {theme} skinned elderly human village elder, front-facing gentle expression, deeply lined face showing decades of wisdom, kind cloudy blue eyes, long white hair and beard, weathered gentle hands, wearing simple homespun robes with wooden beads, holding gnarled walking staff, humble village cottage background with herbs hanging to dry, soft natural daylight through window, peaceful warm lighting, fantasy NPC portrait, highly detailed age wrinkles and caring expression, D&D character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Dark Necromancer
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a sinister {theme} skinned human necromancer, bust shot, malevolent cold expression, sunken eyes glowing with sickly green necromantic energy, gaunt pale face showing years of dark magic corruption, long greasy black hair, skeletal thin fingers with black-stained nails, wearing tattered black robes with bone decorations, holding skull with glowing runes, dark crypt background with skeletal remains and forbidden tomes, eerie green and purple lighting casting ominous shadows, fantasy villain portrait, highly detailed corrupted features and dark magical effects, D&D antagonist art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Brutal Warlord
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a ruthless {theme} skinned half-orc warlord, front-facing menacing glare, fierce bloodshot eyes radiating cruelty, battle-scarred face with broken tusk, shaved head with war paint, prominent lower jaw tusks, massive shoulders, wearing spiked black armor covered in trophies from defeated enemies, blood-stained war axe over shoulder, burning village background softly out of focus, harsh dramatic lighting emphasizing brutal features, red ambient glow from flames, fantasy villain portrait, highly detailed scars and intimidating presence, D&D antagonist art style, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Cultist High Priest
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a fanatical {theme} skinned human cultist leader, three-quarter view with zealous expression, wild obsessed eyes showing madness, gaunt angular features, ritual scars on face forming occult symbols, shaved head with branded mark, wearing crimson ceremonial robes with golden eldritch symbols, ornate ritual dagger, dark altar background with flickering candles and forbidden icons, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with blood-red accents, ominous shadows, fantasy villain portrait, highly detailed ritual markings and fanatical intensity, D&D antagonist character art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Vampire Lord
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of an aristocratic {theme} vampire lord, bust shot, predatory elegant expression, piercing crimson eyes with hypnotic gaze, impossibly pale flawless skin, aristocratic sharp features, jet-black hair slicked back, subtle hint of elongated fangs visible in slight smile, wearing high-collared black velvet coat with blood-red silk lining, silver jewelry with rubies, gothic castle interior background with moonlight streaming through arched window, dramatic blue moonlight and red accent lighting, fantasy vampire portrait, highly detailed aristocratic features and gothic atmosphere, D&D undead villain art, 3:4 aspect ratio

templates.name: Ancient Lich
templates.basePrompt: Portrait of a terrifying {theme} ancient lich, front-facing ethereal horror, skeletal face with parchment-thin skin stretched over bone, eye sockets burning with malevolent green soul-fire, wisps of necrotic energy curling from skull, tattered remains of ancient royal crown, withered bony hands clutching ornate staff topped with phylactery, wearing decayed ancient robes once magnificent now blackened, dark throne room background filled with magical artifacts and hovering spell tomes, ominous green and purple magical lighting, shadows seeming alive, fantasy undead portrait, highly detailed bone structure and necromantic magic effects, D&D legendary villain art, 3:4 aspect ratio
